permitHolder: HUGGS DAY SCHOOL WITH LOVE INC

latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Initial Annual Inspection - Reinspection Not Required

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection child care service failed to provide sufficient lighting and or failed to maintain adequate foot candles in areas used by children

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service providing care without a staff member trained in First Aid/CPR on site at time of inspection
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection hand wash sinks are not supplied with an adequate amount of running water At time of inspection water temperature exceeded 115 deg Fahrenheit
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Appropriate sanitary receptacle and disinfectant not provided in diaper changing area at time of inspection
At time of inspection it was determined/observed that food service worker not provided with appropriate food thermometer during food prep
